name: Joseph Hegarty
body:
### Hello, I'm a DBA.....
....and an engineer with a wide array of skills that allow me to be liquid in utility and very precise. 
The aptitude of my abilities is rivaled by my drive & desire to explore bold innovation as well as opportunity.

### ... and ...
I am eager to lead the charge to solve challenges. 
I can explore and explain technical concepts in laymen terms to non-technical personnel.

* Talented
* Experienced
* Creative and Driven

### Skills and Competencies

Database Administration, Application Development, Service Management and Operations Support 

### Technology and Software

Oracle Database, Microsoft SQL Server, Eloquence Database, Java, Bash, Eloquence Database, SQL, 
PL/SQL, T-SQL, Linux & Unix
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
